title: game never let me reconnect
body:
the game just disconnects for no reason ( my internet is so fine ) and then when i try to reconnect it says on loading screen that ping is 0 , and after a minute , it says failed to reconnect , and my team starts raging me like if it's my fault ! 
we just lost the tournament too because of that , so plz can you tell how to fix this ?

replies.body:
This sounds like a frustrating situation and I hate to say this, but your connection seems to be having some serious issues staying connected to the game server.  Even if your internet is fine, something is hurting your comms to us.  It could be a routing issue, packet loss, or even something caused by being on wi-fi.   

I recommend using the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help.  Configuring DNS and port forwarding would be especially helpful, and a wired connection if on wifi.
